Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.World
      • Building
  • public class Building
extends greenfoot.World
    Creates the simulation world with 6 floors and 3 lift cabines Note: Has a public static randomizer method!
    Version:
  • V0.4 18.12.2017 old Version,
  • V0.5 21.08.2017 Refactoring,
  • V0.6 07.01.2019 Java-Doc completed
    • Author:
    KEL

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Building()
      Standard Constructor: Create a building with default number of lifts and stories. this executes whole blocks of code from the STORIES and LIFTS methods.
      Building​(int floors, int lifts)
      Constructor: Create a building with specified number of lifts and stories.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Building

        public Building()
        Standard Constructor: Create a building with default number of lifts and stories. this executes whole blocks of code from the STORIES and LIFTS methods.

      • Building

        public Building​(int floors,
                int lifts)
        Constructor: Create a building with specified number of lifts and stories. This creates a world size based on the number of lifts and stories of the building.
        Parameters:
        floors - numbers of floors to build
        lifts - numbers of lifts to add

    • Method Detail

      • createFloors

        Create all the floors in the building.
        Parameters:
        numberOfFloors - number of floors to be build

      • createLifts

        public void createLifts​(int numberOfLifts,
                        int numberOfFloors)
        Create all the lifts in the building.
        Parameters:
        numberOfLifts - number of lifts to be build
        numberOfFloors - number of floors to be build

      • getFloorAt

        public Floor getFloorAt​(int y)
        Return the floor at a given screen cell y-coordinate. If this cell is not the exact height of an existing floor, return null.
        Parameters:
        y - y-coordinate to spot
        Returns:
        the spotted floor-object
